content.description: The West Side Slab route is located on the left side of the boulder.Located on the right side of the slab wall is West Side Slab. Start with a double hand match on the rail system towards the right, and make your way into Mid Day Mantle.
content.protection: Crashpads are recommended. There is an awkward stump sitting in the middle of the drop zone.
content.location: The Crispy Creme Boulder is located just across the Sidewinder Boulder, which are both sitting in the main area of the upper sanction of Kindercare.

content.description: Sit start at the bottom nose of the boulder, and start with a double bat hang nd traverse to the right to top out at the peak of the Surfs up Boulder.
content.location: Surfs Up Boulder is located just down the hill from the major pile of boulders in the Upper KinderCare sanction, In Between the Sidewinder Boulder and the Shocka Boulder.

content.description: When approaching the boulder, you'll see Tedious Tidings sit start with a solid low side pull on the left of the rock. Work your way through the traverse and top out at its highest point towards the right side.
content.protection: Lowball. No protection needed except maybe a crashpad.
content.location: The Slip'N'Slide Boulder is located just to the right of Harry's Boulder, which sits at the top of Upper KinderCare. when approaching the boulder, you'll see Tedious Tidings sit start with a low side pull on the left of the rock.work your way through the traverse and top out at its highest point.

content.description: Sit start with both hands on right arete, climb up  the short arete and top out with difficult mantle. Same finish as No More Corn. Climb is harder for shorter folks.
content.location: Same boulder as No More Corn, see description there. Climbs up the right arete.

content.description: Stand Start on the right. Work with what little you have to offer and balance your way to the top.
content.location: Located on the backside of the Slip'N'Slide Boulder, which sits in Upper Kindercare to the right of Harry's Boulder.

content.description: Start with a foot jam on left crack and work a direct route up to a couple sloppy knobs. Footwork is key here.
content.location: Slick Rick is located on the backside of the Slip'N'Slide Boulder. Walk around the left side to the start on the far left crack.

content.description:
Sit start at the right side of the boulder, where you can find two parallel rails

. Work your way around the left side and top out at the peak.
content.protection: Exposed rock on the left side of the drop zone. Crashpad recommended.
content.location: The sidewinder Boulder is located in the upper sanction of Kindercare, in between the Slip'NSlide Boulder and the Krispy Creme Boulder.

content.description: Sit start at the obvious left hand jug and right hand jug knob.  Gain the large flake and press out into a delicate thin mantel.
content.location: Second boulder left of the large square cut block in the Lower Kindercare area.

content.description: Start at the bottom of the face that points towards the trail, where you will find a stand start rail. work a direct route through the rail system to top out.
content.protection: Sketchy landingzone. Uneven surface to land on, bring crashpads and rely on spotters.
content.location: On The Shelf is located on the Shocka Boulder, which sits in the middle section of Kindercare, on the trail that links the upper and lower sections together. Hollow Point Boulder and Surfs Up Boulder are two identifiable landmarks nearby.

content.description: Start sitting with right hand on undercling/sidepull at bottom of the crack down the center of the face. Left hand around the arete on diagonal crack. Work upward and right using left arete and crimps, toping out with a difficult mantle above the right arete and flaring crack above (tops out at same location as Sticks and Stones). All holds used on FA are solid, some loose stuff around, will clean up with traffic. A direct variation without going right may be possible with more difficulty.
content.location: Located on the backside of the Generator Boulder.

content.description: Towards the left side of the slab wall is Mid Day Mantle. Start with an obvious sit start and mantle into and over the starting jug, working the crack system and topping out over the middle of the wall.
content.protection: Crashpads recommended, drop zone is a little sketchy. stump and rocks are directly behind you.
content.location: The Crispy Creme Boulder is located directly across from the Sidewinder Boulder, lwhich is sitting in the upper sanction of KinderCare.

content.description: The direct route and traverse both start on the right side of the boulder on a pair of beautiful crimps. The direct is as it implies, A direct route up the right side of the face. The traverse branches from right to left, across the face of the rock to the glorious flake. Mantle to slopers and top out.
content.location: Harry's Home is a great warm up boulder located on the top of the Upper KinderCare section. Once you reach the top there will be two obvious boulders sitting 15 ft. away from one another.

content.description: Start with 2 hands on the large, pronounced crack on the right side of the boulder. This is followed by a nice and pronounced dark hand hold left of the crack as well as a nice hold on the right of the crack as well. From there, find good foot holds throughout and make your way up to an easy finish and top out.
content.protection: one crash pad at the bottom is more than sufficient
content.location: This problem is located just right of the V0 ‘Stick or Slip’ problem and to the left of V1 ‘Tedious Tidings’ as well.

content.description: Solid hand jams all the way through crux. Finish with seemingly easy mantle.

content.location: The face to the left side of the wide crack on the hilltop boulder

content.description: Left side of the square cut block in the lower area. Start at the arête and gain the middle of the face. Thin movement to the lip of the boulder.
content.protection: Need a couple of pads to protect the pit, and a good spot from the boulder behind.

content.description: Sit start the right side of the arete and utilize the two dishes for foot smearing. Work the arete and make your way up the blank right face and top out.
content.protection: Crashpads and spotters are recommended for this route. The topout is a little tricky and there is a risk of falling on a nearby boulder so climb responsibly.
content.location: Angular Arete is located on the Crispy Creme Boulder, which sits in the main pile of boulders sanctioned in the Upper Kindercare area. The Sidewinder and Surfs Up Boulder are both local formations that can be used as landmarks.

content.description: Sit start at the low hanging jug on the bottom left of the arete and work your way to the peak.
content.protection: I'd recommend crashpads and a spotter. Drop zone is uneven and has rocks in areas.
content.location: The Angler route is located on the Shocka Boulder, which sits in Between the Surfs Up Boulder and the Hollow Point Boulder in between the Upper and Lower sanctions of KinderCare
